pages.text: Only applicable to simple mobs. Mobs with this trait will split into 2 when killed, each with half mob level and same trait / trait level, except this trait will be 1 level lower.$(br2)Mobs spawned will not drop anything.
When this trait is present, Undying trait will not trigger. However, the spawned mobs will inherit the undying trait, which will trigger when the mobs can no longer split.
